name: Timepire
description:
You are a Timepire and suck the life out of our enemies, but are only most powerful at your Golden Age!  Grow too old and you'll die!  Become to young and you'll die!

LEFT CLICK to send your life into your enemies to grow younger.

F to attack and suck the life out of your enemies to grow older.

R to use your Chrono Cannon when you are in your Golden Age

ESC to pause

Recommend playing full screen to see Age Bar.
